original_text: Make them refuse to understand. Cause their ears to be deaf and their eyes to be blind. If you do not do that, they might use their eyes to see. They might use their ears to listen. They might use their minds to understand. Then they might turn back to me so that I would make them well again.’
korean_text: 이 백성의 마음을 둔하게 하며 그들의 귀가 막히고 그들의 눈이 감기게 하라 염려하건대 그들이 눈으로 보고 귀로 듣고 마음으로 깨닫고 다시 돌아와 고침을 받을까 하노라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: Cause their ears to be deaf
and their eyes to be blind.
If you do not do that,
they might use their eyes to see.
They might use their ears to listen.
They might use their minds to understand.
Then they might turn back to me
so that I would make them well again.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 내가 그들을 다시 고쳐줄 것이다.
